casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 26, 2014

[Cite as 06/26/2014 Case Announcements #3, 2014-Ohio-2780.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2014-1071. Randall v. Randall.

Hamilton App. No. C-130527. This cause is pending before the court as a jurisdictional appeal.

Upon review of the motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment, it is ordered by the court that appellee shall file a response, if any, to the motion for stay no later than Monday, June 30, 2014.
